definition: to demand payment/to extort/to trace/to seek/to pursue/to explore
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia

sentences.chinese: 债券持有者们放弃了一些债务追索权。

sentences.english: The states had no recourse but to await the verdict of the high tribunal.
sentences.chinese: 各州没有追索权，只能坐待高级法院的判决。

sentences.english: A goal will be to secure financing which is non-recourse to the owners.
sentences.chinese: 目标之一将是获得对股东无追索权的融资。

sentences.english: Offer peasants non-recourse mortgage loans to support the prices of agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 向农民提供无追索贷款支持农产品价格。

sentences.english: Availble against beneficiary 's draft, without recourse to drawers.
sentences.chinese: 凭受益人汇票办理，对出票人无追索权。

definition: to demand payment of money owing
loss (of sth through natural disaster, theft etc) (law)
to try to find out/to trace/to track down
to keep/to preserve/extant/to remain (from the past)
to use up/to exhaust/to probe to the bottom/limit/end
